import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { Form } from "react-bootstrap"; import LoadingBox from "../components/LoadingBox"; import MessageBox from "../components/MessageBox"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { makeCars } from "../actions/carActions"; export default function VehicleDetailsForm(props) { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { handleChange, checkoutForm } = props; const carMakeList = useSelector((state) => state.carMakeList); const {loading, error, carMakes } = carMakeList; useEffect(() => { dispatch(makeCars()); },[]) return (
You are ready to book. CONTINUE!!!
Vehicle Make {loading ? () : error?({error}): ( { carMakes.map((make, index) => ( )) } ) }
Send a copy of the quote to First Available Date Phone Is it operable?{" "}
By providing your information, you agree to our privacy policy and SMS notifications. Up to 8msgs/mo. Msg&data rates may apply. Text STOP to unsubscribe.
); }
